title: Could the '08 Mumbai Attack Have Been Prevented? (American Terrorist) (full documentary) | FRONTLINE
selftext: Mumbai attacks could have been stopped.
comments:
Wow as an American I've never heard of this guy before. (I did hear about the 08 mumbai attack so I'm not **that** much of a clueless American.) 

  This is a stupidly weak argument from the US government btw. They can't/don't even prevent domestic terrorism with all their spying on US citizens. It's just an excuse to gather data on people.
